response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds immense value to us, reflecting years of expertise and innovation. We understand its significance to you, valued at $1,000,000. To ensure a mutually beneficial transaction, we propose a price of $900,000 for this remarkable product. We believe this offer reflects a fair compromise, allowing you to secure this asset while providing us with a satisfactory return on our investment. Please let us know if you require any further information or if you wish to proceed with this offer.", "product_price": 900000}
